verses.text: Ach in Diosal, tzach in nib'ej val icha junok nok' k'ultaquil chej tzek' sayoj ha' yuj taquinhtial.
Ach Dios pitzan, a val in pensar tzach nib'anochi, ¿b'aq'uinh ol in k'och t'a ichanh junelxo?
k'ual t'ak'val voq'ui. Axonhej voq'uel tik ayoch in vaeloc, yacb'an sb'uchvaj eb' anima t'ayin sk'anb'ejnhej eb': ¿B'ajtil ay jun a Diosal chi? xchi eb'.

Ayic tzin naan juntzanh tik, ste och pitz'an t'a in k'ool. Tzin naancoti ayic ay in ek' t'a skal eb' anima, yic tzin cuchb'an eb', yic tzonh b'at t'a a templo. Manhxo jantacoc yel yav eb' yuj tzalajk'olal yet' ak'oj yuj diosal. Nivan q'uinh ton val jun chi'.
¿Tas val yuj schab'axq'ue in k'ool? ¿Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal, ayach och yipoc in k'ool, olto val wach' lolonel t'ayach, in Columal, in Diosal aji.
Ach in Diosal te cusk'olal vaj ticnaic, yuj chi', manh jantacoc ach in naancot t'a yol yic ha' Jordán yet' t'a yol yic svitzal Hermón yet' svitzal Mizar.
Icha sk'anh yem ponholjoc ha ha' t'a nivac pajav, icha val chi' juntzanh nivac cusk'olal tzek' t'a vib'anh uuj.
Ach Jehová, ha t'a k'ualil tza ch'oxnhej a wach'k'olal t'ayin, haxo t'ak'walil, max in och vaan ach in b'itani, max in och pax vaan in lesalvi t'ayach, yujto a ach tzak' in q'uinal.
Svalan icha tik t'ayach: Ach in Columal, ¿tas yuj tzin b'atcan satk'olal uuj? Yuj chi' cusnac in k'ool ayic tzin b'eyeq'ui, yujto tzin yixtej val eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, xin chi.
Svab' val syail, icha val to smak'jipoj in b'aquil b'aj tzin yixtej eb' ajk'ool chi'. Junjun rato sb'uchvaj eb' t'ayin sk'anb'an eb': ¿B'ajtil ay jun a Diosal chi'? xchi eb'.
¿Tas val yuj schab'axq'ue in k'ool? ¿Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal, ayach och yipoc in k'ool, olto val wach' lolonel t'ayach, in Columal, in Diosal aji.
